{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=AIR-CAP3502 |revision=P-A-K9 |asin=B00G2D6ON6 |fcc_date=02/09/2012 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=access point |fcc_id=LDK102079P,LDK102073 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.35 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Applied Micro |cpu1_model=PowerPC 460 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module=Cisco TG2050 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8364C |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8063 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-TNC |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Cisco TG2050 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip1_model=88W8364C |wi2_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip2_model=88W8063 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-TNC |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54610 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Cisco Aironet 802.11n Dual Band Access Point}} :[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/prod/collateral/wireless/ps5678/ps10981/data_sheet_c78-594630.html Product page] (3500 series) {{•}} [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/wireless/aironet-3500p-access-point/data_sheet_c78-676841.html Datasheet]
*Part of the ''[[Cisco]]'' Aironet 3500 Series :32MB Flash, 128MB DRAM
The CPU used in this device is an ''[[AMCC]]'' PowerPC. :CPU: [[AMCC]] PowerPC 440/460 series ?? (U17) :[http://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Applied_Micro_Circuits_Corporation Applied Micro Circuits Corporation (AMCC)]
*[http://www.mlcp.com/products/Cisco/Wireless/Access-Points ''Cisco Wireless Access Points'' on '''MLCP'''] :[http://www.mlcp.com/products/Cisco/Wireless/Access-Points/AIR-CAP3502P-A-K9 Cisco Aironet CAP3502P-A-K9] - PowerPC Processor :[http://www.mlcp.com/products/Cisco/Wireless/Access-Points/AIR-AP1231G-E-K9 Cisco AIR-AP1231G-E-K9] - IBM PowerPC 405 @200MHz :[http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/Cisco-AIR-LAP1242G-A-K9-1240-Series-PoE-Wireless-Lightweight-Access-Point-AP-/180931645637 Cisco AIR-LAP1242G-A-K9] - PowerPC FTX1408B04M @262MHz (Elvis)
